attachments.displayName:
DRAWING CONTEST! YES! I'm bringing back the annual art contest!
Thank you +Dianna Odtujan for your fantastic idea! I used to do this... and unfortunately not a lot of people signed up, I only remember my awesome friend +Arianna Zingale For always participating. :)
So... Here are the rules and the theme!
Theme: Attack on Titan x Vocaloid
So I really wanted someone to draw a Shingeki no Vocaloid Type of thing.. ALL ART MUST BE ORIGINAL ART. (no you may not use the picture below, sorry) Whomever wins gets a Picture or edit request... or a video request! ^_^
Rules:
☆ Must be ORIGINAL ART
☆ MUST BE SUBMITTED BY Nov: 20
☆ NO HENTAI, YURI, OR YAOI.
☆ HAVE FUN <3
SIGN UP BY COMMENTING BELOW! :) (I will put up the list ASAP)
#kawaii   #anime   #vocaloid   #attackontitan   #shingekinokyojin 

☆*:.｡. o(≧▽≦)o .｡.:*☆
attachments.content: Attack on the Titan X Vocaloid.jpg

object.content:
DRAWING CONTEST! YES! I'm bringing back the annual art contest!
Thank you +Dianna Odtujan for your fantastic idea! I used to do this... and unfortunately not a lot of people signed up, I only remember my awesome friend +Arianna Zingale For always participating. :) 
So... Here are the rules and the theme!
Theme: Attack on Titan x Vocaloid 
So I really wanted someone to draw a Shingeki no Vocaloid Type of thing.. ALL ART MUST BE ORIGINAL ART. (no you may not use the picture below, sorry) Whomever wins gets a Picture or edit request... or a video request! ^_^
Rules:
☆ Must be ORIGINAL ART
☆ MUST BE SUBMITTED BY Nov: 20
☆ NO HENTAI, YURI, OR YAOI. 
☆ HAVE FUN <3
SIGN UP BY COMMENTING BELOW! :) (I will put up the list ASAP)
#kawaii   #anime   #vocaloid   #attackontitan   #shingekinokyojin  

 ☆*:.｡. o(≧▽≦)o .｡.:*☆
